\section{Delivery Updates}
	\begin{frame}
		\begin{block}{Tube Testing:}
			\begin{itemize}
				\item Tubes for modules 46 are ready in Tube Room. 
				\item Tubes for Mod 41 was brought down last Thursday, June 8th.
				\item $\sim$130 tubes still testing (TT,LT). 
				\item Testing $\sim$200 tubes that are bent $\leq$1.0mm as well. Will re-measure DC, TT, Leak Rate, and straightness.
			\end{itemize}
		\end{block}
		\begin{block}{Delivery:}
			\begin{itemize}
				\item Previous delivery was June 1st (80 tubes).
				\item No more deliveries scheduled. MSU has $\sim30$ remaining tubes that they can bring when picking up combs. 
				\item MSU can pick up combs whenever is convenient. Likely the ideal day would be on a Thursday, when a shipment would have been scheduled otherwise.
			\end{itemize}
		\end{block}
	\end{frame}
